title: Cooking with All Things Trader Joe's
description: COOKING WITH ALL THINGS TRADER JOE’S is the cookbook fans have been waiting for. Time-starved professionals and families will be able to enjoy the convenience of quick homemade meals without resorting to take-out, frozen TV dinners, or (heaven forbid!) fast food. Make delicious, healthy, home-cooked meals with typical working times of around 10 minutes— recipes like Peanutty Sesame Noodles, a favorite of kids and adults alike; Go Go Mango Chicken, bringing tropical zest to ordinary chicken, and Honey, I Ate the Chocolate Bread Pudding, a quick version of the Southern classic. In addition to mouth-watering photos for every recipe, you’ll find health facts, food trivia, and nuggets from the authors’ personal life experiences sprinkled throughout.
author: Deana Gunn
